name: Cabbage Leaves
description: Cabbage is an exceptionally healthy food. It has an outstanding nutrient profile and is especially high in vitamins C and K. In addition, eating cabbage may even help lower the risk of certain diseases, improve digestion and combat inflammation. Plus, cabbage leaves ( also known as leafy cabbage) makes a tasty and inexpensive addition to a number of recipes. With so many potential health benefits, it is easy to see why cabbage leaves deserves some time in the spotlight and some room on your plate.
